Judul: Ontologies and Shape Grammars: Communication between Knowledge-Based and Generative Systems
Abstrak:
This paper discusses information flow between knowledge-based models and
shape grammars for generation of building designs, explaining the interaction, system
and implementation. The benefit for using the interactive system is that the
complementary properties of the two schemes are used to strengthen the overall
process. Shape grammar contains rules about the geometric organization, while
knowledge-based model supports the contextual information.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Ramesh Krishnamurti, Kui Yue and Casey Hickerson
Sumber: J.S. Gero and A.K. Goel (eds.), Design Computing and Cognition ’08,© Springer Science + Business Media B.V. 2008
